General.Name: StarPower Semiconductor Ltd
General.Description: StarPower Semiconductor Ltd. researches, develops, produces and sells power semiconductor components worldwide. The company offers IGBT, MOSFET, IPM, FRD, SiC, and other modules. Its products are used in energy vehicles, inverters, inverter welding machines, ups, photovoltaic/wind power, SVG, white goods, and other fields. The company was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Jiaxing, China.

1.Name: Mr. Zhe  Zhang
1.Title: Deputy GM, Sec. of the Board & CFO
